results.title: Metformin limits osteoarthritis development and progression through activation of AMPK signalling
results.text_hl: However, in terms of @<m>DISEASE_Osteophyte</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054850 @@@osteophyte@@@ size and @<m>DISEASE_Osteophyte</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054850 @@@osteophyte@@@ maturity, the progression rates were significantly reduced after @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment in WT @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ (see online supplementary figure S1E, F).
